description: Demolition of existing commercial building and erection of a part two, part three and part four storey building comprising of 12 (twelve) residential units 9 (nine) x 1-bedroom units and 3 (three) x 2-bedroom units (Class C3) including cycle parking, refuse storage, hard and soft landscaping, amendments to site access and other associated works.
